com.opengamma.strata.market

  • Packages that use com.opengamma.strata.market 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.function.marketdata.curve
    Market data functions used for building curves and related market data types.
    com.opengamma.strata.market
    Data structures for market data.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.curve
    Definitions of curves.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.curve.node
    Curve nodes.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.curve.perturb
    Curve perturbations.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.surface
    Definitions of surfaces.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.view
    Package containing views of market data.
    com.opengamma.strata.pricer.capfloor  
    com.opengamma.strata.pricer.swaption
    Calculators for swaptions.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.market used by com.opengamma.strata.function.marketdata.curve 
    Class and Description
    ShiftType
    Enum representing alternative ways to apply a shift which modifies the value of a piece of market data.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.market used by com.opengamma.strata.market 
    Class and Description
    Perturbation
